name: Chained. (GMTK game jam 2021 submission)
description:
It's my submission for the GMTK game jam 2021! 

You play as a character controlling a spiky wrecking ball at the end of a chain, you have to survive as many rounds as you can in this manic fast pased fighting game.

//////////////////////////////////////////////PLEASE READ//////////////////////////////////////////////

The controls are;

W A S D to move

Mouse to look around

You kill enemies by hitting them with the wrecking ball, and you can bouce back enemies and stop projectiles by running into them with your shield, (its blue!)
